newsitem.title: USA: Continental Air stake cut by FMR-led group.
newsitem.headline: Continental Air stake cut by FMR-led group.

text.p: A group led by FMR Corp said Friday it reduced its stake in Continental Airlines Inc to 6,544,220 class B common shares, or 13.92 percent of the class outstanding.

In a filing with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission, the group said it sold a net of 334,000 class B shares of the company between July 12 and August 9 at prices ranging from $22.63 to $60.00 a share.
In a previous filing, the group said it held 15.49 percent or 3,437,660 class B shares of the airline company.
On June 26, Continental Airlines approved a two-for-one stock split, payable July 16 to holders of record of class B and class A common stock on July 2.
